function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Confinement at home due to COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures and social distancing protocols, promote vaccination, and provide adequate ventilation in indoor spaces","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection systems, contactless technologies, vaccination tracking systems","People":"Household members, public health officials, decision-makers","Owner":"Public health authorities, housing designers, researchers"}]}
